trans-unit.source: Exposes <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> types to [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Expõe <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> tipos [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria um <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> remains in memory until the associated <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: Isso <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>permanece na memória até associado <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>é destruído.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The same instance of the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is returned from subsequent calls to this method and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: A mesma instância do que <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>é retornado de chamadas subsequentes para este método e as chamadas para <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.FromElement%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>

trans-unit.source: The type of the peer is determined by the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A> virtual callback.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de ponto o ponto é determinado pelo <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>virtual retorno de chamada.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnCreateAutomationPeer%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> does not implement the callback, no <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> is created, and this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>não implementa o retorno de chamada não <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer>é criado, e esse método retorna `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The created <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O criado <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> especificado <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>; or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> was not created by the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>; ou <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>, se o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> não foi criado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>método.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer.CreatePeerForElement*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a tecla de aceleração para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AcceleratorKey*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAcceleratorKey*>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de acesso para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>. Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The access key for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que identifica exclusivamente o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetAutomationId*>.
trans-unit.target: O <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding rectangle of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que representa o retângulo delimitador do <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that contains the coordinates of the element.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> que contém as coordenadas do elemento.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>, this method returns <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, se o elemento não é tanto uma <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>, esse método retorna <xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>.</xref:System.Windows.Rect.Empty*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho de <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren*>

trans-unit.source: A list of child <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de filhos <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o nome do <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.String> string.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.String>cadeia de caracteres.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> that represents the clickable space that is on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> que representa o espaço que pode ser clicado no <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Point"></xref> on the element that allows a click.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Point"> </xref> no elemento que permite que um clique.

trans-unit.source: The point values are (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) if the element is not both a <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os valores de ponto (<xref:System.Double.NaN>, <xref:System.Double.NaN>) se o elemento não é tanto uma <xref href="System.Windows.Interop.HwndSource"> </xref> e um <xref href="System.Windows.PresentationSource"> </xref>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que descreve a funcionalidade do <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, the string that returns is the same text that the control provides in the tooltip.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, a cadeia de caracteres retornada é o mesmo texto que fornece o controle na dica de ferramenta.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.HelpText*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetHelpText*>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that communicates the visual status of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que se comunica o status visual da <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus*>

trans-unit.source: For example, the status of a messenger contact can be "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o status de um contato messenger pode ser "Ocupado" ou "Online".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemStatus*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemStatus*>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the item type that the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um legível cadeia de caracteres que contém o item de tipo que o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> representa.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType*>

trans-unit.source: String examples are "Mail Message", "Contact", and "Document".
trans-unit.target: Exemplos de cadeia de caracteres são "Email", "Contatos" e "Documento".

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.ItemType*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetItemType*>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o elemento que é direcionado para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy*>

trans-unit.source: The element targeting the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> can be a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, but it does not have to be.
trans-unit.target: O elemento direcionamento a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>pode ser um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, mas não precisa ser.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: If it is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> property will automatically set the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> property as well.
trans-unit.target: Se for um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>, a definição de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A>propriedade definirá automaticamente o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A>propriedade de.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.LabeledBy%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label.Target%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> for the element that is targeted to the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"> </xref> para o elemento que é direcionado para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> para este <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto a <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A> property functions similar to a string of text that users use to explain the control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>funções de propriedade semelhantes a uma cadeia de caracteres de texto que os usuários usam para explicar o controle estão referenciando.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name%2A>

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que você tenha uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: The string that contains the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.Name*> that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetName*>.
trans-unit.target: A cadeia de caracteres que contém o <> </> *> que é retornado por <> </> *>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is laid out in a specific direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> dispostos em uma direção específica.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"></xref> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation"> </xref> valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets the control pattern for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o padrão de controle para o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value from the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: An object that implements the interface if patternInterface is ; otherwise, .
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o interface se patternInterface é ; caso contrário, .

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> atualmente tem a entrada do teclado foco.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento tem o foco de entrada do teclado. Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is an element that contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> é um elemento que contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> é compreendido pelo usuário final como interativo.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the user might understand the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, o usuário pode entender o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> como que contribuem para a estrutura lógica do controle no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> pode aceitar o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> que contém o valor de <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> pode aceitar o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is focusable by the keyboard; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento for Focusable é por teclado; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> está fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen*>

trans-unit.source: This property does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não indica se o elemento está visível.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: Em algumas circunstâncias, um elemento está na tela, mas ainda não está visível.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is on the screen but obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento estiver na tela mas obscurecidas por outros elementos, ele não fiquem visível.

trans-unit.source: In this case the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the element is not on the screen; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o elemento não está na tela; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> contém conteúdo protegido.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword*>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref> é necessário para ser concluída em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""></xref> that contains the value that is returned by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, if it's set; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref uid="langword_csharp_boolean" name="boolean" href=""> </xref> que contém o valor retornado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>, se ele estiver definido; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.GetIsRequiredForForm*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco de entrada do teclado no <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> que é associada a essa <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.UIElementAutomationPeer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus*>
